Brought to you by the professional dance community of the Twin Cities and:

Please join us for Dance Fest 2017!

Now in a 22,000 square feet venue in the heart of downtown St. Paul and with $15,000 in scholarship and gifts, Dance Fest will be bigger and better than ever! Registration is now open, and available here. Don't forget to check out all the details about the event, as several of the rules have changed from years past.

Happening:

4-5 March 2017
(Saturday & Sunday)

Volunteer!

Dance Fest is made possible by the hard work of dozens of volunteers. If you want to contribute your time and skills to help make Dance Fest awesome, fill out this form and we'll help you get involved!

Volunteer

Dance Fest is

a low-cost, beginner-friendly dancesport competition where:

  • Dancers and Spectators alike can enjoy an atmosphere of friendliness, comraderie, and fun unlike any competition in the Midwest
  • New Competitors can see all that dancesport has to offer in a friendly, welcoming atmosphere without breaking the bank.
  • Experienced competitors can compete against some of the nation's best dancers in all styles and levels
  • All competitors and spectators can sharpen their skills with free seminars held throughout the event

Questions? Contact Us.

If you have any questions or need any assistance, please e-mail us at info@upartnerdance.org.
